about_the_game:
This is the original soundtrack for S4U: CITYPUNK 2011 AND LOVE PUNCH.

The game's music and sound effects were crafted by three artists from Rhythm Cluster Studio — KOOOZ, Salty Salt, and Neo Nex (Bilibili: @RhythmCluster律动簇).

By immersing into the perspective of Miki, the protagonist, and weaving in the heartfelt stories between various characters, Rhythm Cluster has created an emotionally rich and narratively profound musical backdrop that defines the world of Castor Yard, the fictional city where the game is set.

The music features diverse styles, blending elements of City Pop, Electronic, Ambient, Afro, and more, forging into a collection of 26 tracks.

We hope these compositions enhance your experience in S4U’s world. Thank you for your support and love!
detailed_description:

About the Game

This is the original soundtrack for S4U: CITYPUNK 2011 AND LOVE PUNCH.

The game's music and sound effects were crafted by three artists from Rhythm Cluster Studio — KOOOZ, Salty Salt, and Neo Nex (Bilibili: @RhythmCluster律动簇).

By immersing into the perspective of Miki, the protagonist, and weaving in the heartfelt stories between various characters, Rhythm Cluster has created an emotionally rich and narratively profound musical backdrop that defines the world of Castor Yard, the fictional city where the game is set.

The music features diverse styles, blending elements of City Pop, Electronic, Ambient, Afro, and more, forging into a collection of 26 tracks.

We hope these compositions enhance your experience in S4U’s world. Thank you for your support and love!
